mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_pw, member_nick, member_phone, member_email, member_auth, member_state, member_report, member_score, member_money) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_nick}, #{member_phone}, #{member_email}, 'USER', NULL, 0, 0.0, 0);
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_fail = #{member_fail}, member_locked = #{member_locked}, member_state = case when #{member_fail}>=3 then '정지' else member_state end WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
update member set member_state = '정지' where member_num = #{member_num}
update member set member_state = '사용' where member_num = #{member_num}
